title: The use of alternative data — like on-time rental payments — could help borrowers boost credit scores
itunes:title: The use of alternative data — like on-time rental payments — could help borrowers boost credit scores
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: In our latest episode in our series “The Score” we look at how alternate data (like timely utility payments) could factor in to the credit scoring system.
itunes:summary: In our latest episode in our series “The Score” we look at how alternate data (like timely utility payments) could factor in to the credit scoring system.
